Text: Project Torque Excluded Facility Review Cc Could you please set up a meeting to review the facilities that I excluded from the Project Torque Analysis Subject Torque Excluded Facility Review Date Friday if possible if not Monday Location James McKays Office EB Attendees Lauri Allen Daren Farmer Melissa Graves James McKay Thank you Melissa

FW Crosstex Energy Driscoll Ranch Meter Nos and Cc the following for april production regarding the Crosstex Contract at the above referenced location Thank you Melissa Original Message From Bubert Jerry Sent Thursday March PM To Taylor Vance L Cc Flynn Shawna Graves Melissa Harris JoAnne Reinhardt Donald P Riley Brian Smith Susan Sweeney Christy Walker Robert Weissman George Subject Crosstex Energy Driscoll Ranch Meter Nos and Per Section of the GPA Crosstex has elected to sell MMBTUD in the aggragate at the Base Contract Price of IF HSC less and the excess of the available gas over MMBTUD in the aggragate at GDA HSC less

Exxon Bids Cc Daren suggested that I forward this request to you Per my voice mail attached below please find a spreadsheet detailing locationsdelivery pointsmeter numbers and available volumes for each package of gas in the Texas Gulf CoastWAHA Area Please provide Firm gas bids for each package for the period April October and April March in the available columns B and C on the spreadsheet After completing the spreadsheet please return to me via email Thank you Melissa Graves X

TriC Resources Governor Bill Daniel Liberty Co Tx Cc CokinosTriC has elected to price their production for the month of February as follows d IFHSC all production in excess of d priced Gas Daily Please correct the pricing for Sitara Ticket accordingly Thank you Melissa Forwarded by Melissa GravesHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From George Weissman AM To Melissa CT cc Susan CT JoAnne nron Subject TriC Resources Governor Bill Daniel Liberty Co Tx Melissa Chris Cokinos called and for February he wants to lock in at first of the month index and the remainder at gas daily on the Governor Bill Daniel contract Please have the sitara deal updated and notify Chris via email at Thanks George x Forwarded by George WeissmanHOUECT on AM From Shawna Flynn on PM Sent by Becky Tlucek To Jeffrey A CT Russell CT George CT cc Subject Cokinos Cokinos document attached per Shawna Flynn

Expected Volumes for October Cc Per our phone conversation please find the following information Camden Resources Inc Driscoll Ranch meter price HSC less North Central Oil Corporation McMurreyTalbert meter price HSC less KCS Dickenson meter Susan Smith will be preparing a formal ticket for the Buy and the Sell for the month of October We will be watching the gas specs on this package and if all goes well we will book the rest of the term at the end of October On a go forward basis for gas that we provide in the monthly nomination that we know is not ticketed can Vance just include the price in the comments field on each package to help you estimate for bidweek Let us know if this information will be helpful in the future Thank you Melissa

FW Crosstex Energy Driscoll Ranch Meters May Cc Jpst All Please note that for May Crosstex Energy Ltd will be paid the base contract price IFHSC under Contract As this is the Base Contract Price in the term agreement no confirmation will be sent to the customer confirming the deal we will only confirm when they elect Gas Daily Pricing Please adjust Sitara as necessary Thank you Melissa Original Message From Bubert Jerry Sent Tuesday April PM To Taylor Vance L Cc Graves Melissa Reinhardt Donald P Riley Brian Smith Susan Walker Robert Weissman George Subject Crosstex Energy Driscoll Ranch Meter May Per Section of the GPA Crosstex has elected to sell this gas approximately D baseload for the month of May at IF HSC Thanks JAB

Re Gas contracts for the listed metersPer your request Thank you Melissa Forwarded by Melissa GravesHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Melissa Graves PM To Gary W CT Greg CT James R CT Edward D CT cc George CT Jill T CT Subject Re Gas contracts for the listed meters Please see the attached spreadsheet for the requested information Please let me know if you have further questions Thank you Melissa Forwarded by Melissa GravesHOUECT on PM Jill T Zivley AM To George CT cc Gary W CT Greg CT James R CT Melissa CT Edward D CT Subject Re Gas contracts for the listed meters George Melissa has already gathered this info earlier It may need to be update but please check with her first Thanks Edward D Gottlob AM To George CT Gary W CT Greg CT James R CT Jill T CT cc Subject Gas contracts for the listed meters George The meters listed below flow into a section of line in East Texas that feeds a paper mill The gas currently being produced is rich if we lose the market the gas production will have to be processed Processing will cost HPL a minimum of k Heres the kicker need this ASAP becase the market wants to pull the trigger by Friday Here are the questions by meter this is important because processing options are different for every meter who are the supply contracts with can HPL terminate the contract for gas quality or did we waive the quality requirements what is the status of each contract when does it terminate is it in evergreen what are the notification procedures what is the price on each contract what did the wells produce in the latest available month last but not least do the contracts let us charge the producer for costs incurred to bring the production up to pipeline quality Jim are these meters correct Are there any questions I did not address

Re Gas contracts for the listed metersPer your request Thank you Melissa Forwarded by Melissa GravesHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Melissa Graves PM To Gary W CT Greg CT James R CT Edward D CT cc George CT Jill T CT Subject Re Gas contracts for the listed meters Please see the attached spreadsheet for the requested information Please let me know if you have further questions Thank you Melissa Forwarded by Melissa GravesHOUECT on PM Jill T Zivley AM To George CT cc Gary W CT Greg CT James R CT Melissa CT Edward D CT Subject Re Gas contracts for the listed meters George Melissa has already gathered this info earlier It may need to be update but please check with her first Thanks Edward D Gottlob AM To George CT Gary W CT Greg CT James R CT Jill T CT cc Subject Gas contracts for the listed meters George The meters listed below flow into a section of line in East Texas that feeds a paper mill The gas currently being produced is rich if we lose the market the gas production will have to be processed Processing will cost HPL a minimum of k Heres the kicker need this ASAP becase the market wants to pull the trigger by Friday Here are the questions by meter this is important because processing options are different for every meter who are the supply contracts with can HPL terminate the contract for gas quality or did we waive the quality requirements what is the status of each contract when does it terminate is it in evergreen what are the notification procedures what is the price on each contract what did the wells produce in the latest available month last but not least do the contracts let us charge the producer for costs incurred to bring the production up to pipeline quality Jim are these meters correct Are there any questions I did not address
